channel.title: how to connect to wifi?
channel.description:
I'm running Whonix through Oracle Virtual Box, inside Windows 8.1., and I'm trying to configure it to connect to the internet.
On Windows I am currently connected to my WiFi.
I have both the Whonix Gateway and the Whonix Workstation opened; on the lower right edge there is an option on the menu to enable the network adapter(s), both on the Gateway and on the Workstation; Despite the fact that I enabled them, I **cannot see any available WiFi.**
Could you tell me how to **connect** to a **WiFi** through Whonix?
I cannot find it on the documentation.
Thank you.

item.title: how to connect to wifi?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Please don’t double post so quickly. You’ll receive an answer here:

unix.stackexchange.com

Whonix, how to connect to a Wifi?

wifi, virtualbox, networkmanager, whonix
asked by robertalrp on 02:49PM - 14 Jan 16

Read full topic

item.title: how to connect to wifi?
item.dc:creator: robertalrp
item.description:
I’m running Whonix through Oracle Virtual Box, inside Windows 8.1., and I’m trying to configure it to connect to the internet.

On Windows I am currently connected to my WiFi.

I have both the Whonix Gateway and the Whonix Workstation opened; on the lower right edge there is an option on the menu to enable the network adapter(s), both on the Gateway and on the Workstation; Despite the fact that I enabled them, I cannot see any available WiFi.

Could you tell me how to connect to a WiFi through Whonix?

I cannot find it on the documentation.

Thank you.

Read full topic
